23-0507.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation on the 2021-2026 Strategic Plan from the Long Beach Department of Health and Human Services.Kelly Colopy, Director of Health and Human Services, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Jessica Schumer, Deputy Director, Health and Human Services, spoke; and continued the PowerPoint presentation.Kelly Colopy, Director of Health and Human Services, spoke; and Page 1 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 2:00 PMTUESDAY, MAY 16, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AND PUBLIC HEALTH COMMITTEE MINUTEScontinued the PowerPoint presentation.Councilmember Ricks-Oddie spoke.Kelly Colopy, Director of Health and Human Services, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Councilmember Ricks-Oddie and Kelly Colopy, Director of Health and Human Services.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Kelly Colopy, Director of Health and Human Services, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Austin and Kelly Colopy, Director of Health and Human Services.Chair Kerr spoke.Jessica Schumer, Deputy Director, Health and Human Services, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Kerr and Jessica Schumer, Deputy Director, Health and Human Services.A motion was made by Member Ricks-Oddie, seconded by Vice Chair Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Ricks-Oddie, Austin and Kerr2.
